description.p: DFBU is a desktop application for comprehensive backup and restoration of Linux configuration files (dotfiles). Built with a modern MVVM architecture, it provides an intuitive graphical interface for managing your configuration file backups.

ul.li: Mirror and compressed archive backup modes with rotation
Interactive dotfile management with tags and descriptions
Backup verification with size and optional SHA-256 hash checking
Pre-restore safety backups for safe restoration
File size analysis with configurable thresholds

description.p: Production release with full error handling and file size management.
